intent_atoms.description: Bundle the official MP4 Registration Authority (MP4RA) box metadata into the parser so box names, categories, and fallback descriptions are available during streaming parse operations.
MP4RA catalog JSON is bundled with the Swift package and can be loaded without network access.
Parser emits box events annotated with human-readable names and categories when entries exist.
Unknown or missing entries log structured fallback records compatible with the existing research log (per VR-006 note in workplan).

functional_units.name: MP4RA Catalog Bundle
functional_units.description: Include the MP4 Registration Authority metadata catalog as a bundled JSON asset within the Swift package for offline access

functional_units.name: Runtime Catalog Loader
functional_units.description: Load and parse the bundled MP4RA JSON at application start without network calls

functional_units.name: Box Metadata Registry Service
functional_units.description: Provide a lightweight registry that maps fourcc box types to human‑readable names, categories, and summaries during streaming parsing

functional_units.name: Event Annotation Middleware
functional_units.description: Annotate parser box events with cataloged name, category, and summary when available

functional_units.name: Unknown Box Fallback Logger
functional_units.description: Log structured fallback records for boxes not found in the catalog, compatible with existing research log format

functional_units.name: Unit Test Suite for Catalog Operations
functional_units.description: Tests covering catalog loading, lookup hits, and unknown‑box fallback paths

functional_units.name: Dependency Injection Point for Catalog Updates
functional_units.description: Allow runtime configuration or injection to update the catalog without code changes (e.g., versioned JSON asset)
